success.title: Poll closed
success.description:
The poll with ID **%s** was closed!
No more votes are allowed and the result is now displayed in the poll.

failed.title: Poll can not be closed
failed.description: The poll with ID **%s** is already closed or does not exist!

commands.poll: Create a normal poll without time limit
commands.timepoll: Create a timed poll, set an end date until when the poll will run
commands.closepoll: Close a poll so that no more votes are counted

commands.invite: Invite EasyPoll to your own Discord Server
commands.ping: See the Ping of the Bot to the Discord Gateway

field.title: You have entered an invalid time!
field.description:
Use a valid time code. Time codes can consist of several times ending with s (second), m (minute), h (hour), d (day) or w (week).
Examples: 15m for 15 minutes, 1h for 1 hour, 3d for 3 days, 3d5h2m for 3 days, 5 hours and 2 minutes

*PS: You can click on the blue `/timepoll` command above this message to receive a copy of the used command for your poll*

field.title: You have specified an unknown emoji!
field.description:
Please make sure it is an **official Discord** emoji or an emoji **from this server**. EasyPoll can only use emojis from servers where EasyPoll is too.

*PS: You can click on the blue `%s` command above this message to receive a copy of the used command for your poll*

change.title: Change Bot Language
change.description:
Here you can change the language of the Bot on this server.
Please select a new language:

success.title: Bot language has been changed
success.description: The Bot language on this server was successfully changed to **%s**.

vote.title: Vote for EasyPoll
vote.description:
We are happy that you want to vote for our bot. You show us that you like the bot and help us to grow further.

You can vote for us on the following pages:

member.title: You do not have premissions to use this command!

field.title: To use this command you need at least one of them:

bot.title: I do not have the required permissions to perform all actions!
